messages.text:
LGTM

(sorry, was waiting for you to mail the CL)

*** Submitted as 1feba777e93c ***

go/token: remove dependency on encoding/gob

R=dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5636053

Hello dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

i think this has also removed a potential bug:
if FileSet.Read was called with a reader that
was not a ByteReader, i think it would have
eaten too many bytes and lost sync.

On 7 February 2012 01:41,  <gri@golang.org> wrote:
> *** Submitted as 1feba777e93c ***
>
>
> go/token: remove dependency on encoding/gob
>
> R=dsymonds
> CC=golang-dev
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5636053
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5636053/

There was a comment w/ respect to that issue in the old code (
http://codereview.appspot.com/5636053/diff/5002/src/pkg/go/token/serialize.go,
line 35), but I don't see now where the ByteReader would be
introduced).
- gri

On Tue, Feb 7, 2012 at 4:14 AM, roger peppe <rogpeppe@gmail.com> wrote:
> i think this has also removed a potential bug:
> if FileSet.Read was called with a reader that
> was not a ByteReader, i think it would have
> eaten too many bytes and lost sync.
>
